original_text: And Noah and his sons and his wife and his sons' wives with him went into the ark to escape the waters of the flood.
korean_text: 노아는 아들들과 아내와 며느리들과 함께 홍수를 피하여 방주에 들어갔고

sentences.original_text: Noah and his sons and his wife and his sons' wives with him
to escape the waters of the flood
